description: Lists the repository sync definitions for repository links in your account.

parameters.name: RepositoryLinkId
parameters.description: The ID of the repository link for the sync definition for which you want to retrieve information.

parameters.name: SyncType
parameters.description: The sync type of the repository link for the the sync definition for which you want to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: RepositorySyncDefinitions
nested_items.description: The list of repository sync definitions returned by the request. A RepositorySyncDefinition is a mapping from a repository branch to all the Amazon Web Services resources that are being synced from that branch.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The branch specified for a repository sync definition.

nested_items.name: Directory
nested_items.description: The configuration file for a repository sync definition. This value comes from creating or updating the config-file field of a sync-configuration.

nested_items.name: Parent
nested_items.description: The parent resource specified for a repository sync definition.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The target resource specified for a repository sync definition. In some cases, such as CFN_STACK_SYNC, the parent and target resource are the same.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that, when provided in a request, returns the next batch of the results.
